column1: Smoque BBQ////BYO BBQ joint is great
column2: unfortunately if you are going for the BYO
column3: you are required to sit inside. I had the pulled pork platter
column4: with an add on taste of ribs. The meat is well smoked
column5: I preferred the Carolina to the Memphis
column6: but that may just be a matter of taste. Between my friend and I
column7: I tried all the sides. I would say the beans
column8: cornbread and Mac n Cheese are the winners. The chili is alright
column10: and if you're having the BBQ it just doesn't pair correctly. Even with a line that reached to the door service is quick
column11: so don't let that deter you. I tried the bread pudding
column12: it had a good flavor but it would of been great if it was served warm.
